dmca.title: CLSP Studies the DMCA
dmca.body:
To Google Legal Support,

On behalf of the Center for the Study of Learning and Performance (CSLP) of Concordia University, I am sending you this letter to file a notice of copyright infringement.

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Center for the Study of Learning and Performance (CLSP) of Concordia University
